front.title: LMA Discovery for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: Large Proxy Mobile IPv6 deployments would benefit from afunctionality, where a Mobile Access Gateway could dynamicallydiscover a Local Mobility Anchor for a Mobile Node attaching to aProxy Mobile IPv6 domain. The purpose of the dynamic discoveryfunctionality is to reduce the amount of static configuration in theMobile Access Gateway. This specification describes a number ofpossible dynamic Local Mobility Anchor discovery solutions.
